name: LBPManagerFactory
description: LBPManager Factory. Governance to create new LBPManager contracts.

parameterDecorators.name: _admin
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the admin of the LBPManager.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenList
parameterDecorators.description: Numerically sorted array (ascending) containing two addresses: - The address of the project token being distributed. - The address of the funding token being exchanged for the project token.

parameterDecorators.name: _amounts
parameterDecorators.description: Sorted array to match the _tokenList, containing two parameters: - The amounts of project token to be added as liquidity to the LBP. - The amounts of funding token to be added as liquidity to the LBP.

parameterDecorators.name: _startWeights
parameterDecorators.description: Sorted array to match the _tokenList, containing two parametes: - The start weight for the project token in the LBP. - The start weight for the funding token in the LBP.

parameterDecorators.name: _startTimeEndtime
parameterDecorators.description: Array containing two parameters: - Start time for the LBP. - End time for the LBP.

parameterDecorators.name: _endWeights
parameterDecorators.description: Sorted array to match the _tokenList, containing two parametes: - The end weight for the project token in the LBP. - The end weight for the funding token in the LBP.

parameterDecorators.name: _fees
parameterDecorators.description: Array containing two parameters: - Percentage of fee paid for every swap in the LBP. - Percentage of fee paid to the _beneficiary for providing the service of the LBP Manager.

parameterDecorators.name: _metadata
parameterDecorators.description: IPFS Hash of the LBP creation wizard information.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setLBPFactory
functionDecorators.description: Set Balancers LBP Factory contract as basis for deploying LBPs.

parameterDecorators.name: _lbpFactory
parameterDecorators.description: The address of Balancers LBP factory.

functionDecorators.name: setMasterCopy
functionDecorators.description: Set LBPManager contract which works as a base for clones.

parameterDecorators.name: _masterCopy
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new LBPManager basis.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
